body:
Overview

HackerRank Interviews have an inbuilt audio and video call functionality for the Interviewers and Candidates to interact with each other during the interview. To enhance this functionality, HackerRank joined with Zoom, a well-known video telephony software that provides a seamless communication experience for its users.

HackerRank Interviews, now powered by Zoom, aims to provide this same seamless experience. 

Note: This feature is currently supported on Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Firefox. The latest versions of browsers are recommended for a hassle-free experience. 

Prerequisites

  • To have this working, ensure that your organization has not blocked these URLs:
    • *.zoom.us
    • *.*.zoom.us
    • zoom.us

Compatibility Check for Tests and Interviews

You can check your connectivity status on the HackerRank Compatibility tool of HackerRank.

This tool checks the audio/video permissions, internet strength, device type, Window size, browser compatibility, and other parameters.

If you face any problem accessing the above domain, you can reach out to support@hackerrank.com with a screenshot of the error message. 

  • The Zoom experience in HackerRank Interviews works in such a way that you need not have a Zoom account or install any software. Once you initiate the call in an interview, it is connected through Zoom automatically. 

Benefits of HackerRank Interviews powered by Zoom 

  • HackerRank Interviews powered by Zoom enables you to connect your calls within seconds without lag.  
  • Network drops and slow internet connections are very common. One of the main benefits of Interviews powered by Zoom is that the call quality works fine even with a slow internet connection.  
  • We recommend you turn your video off in case of any issues with the audio quality. 
  • In case of a network drop, calls will reconnect automatically if your connection resumes within 2 minutes.
title: Audio and Video Calls in Interviews Powered by Zoom
